thread.title: People Are Pissed At Demi Lovato For Tweeting She’s ‘1 Percent African’
thread.title_full: People Are Pissed At Demi Lovato For Tweeting She’s ‘1 Percent African’

author: Kaylin Pound
title: People Are Pissed At Demi Lovato For Tweeting She’s ‘1 Percent African’
text:
Plus, there were those who just really didn’t have the time or energy to deal with yet another one of Demi’s ridiculous Twitter feuds. A few people, however, did stand up for Demi Lovato and try to defend the singer. . @greylovxto @upallnightpayno @ddlovato If anyone has trouble understanding this it's from mean girls pic.twitter.com/wXFfbwft2Z 
— zak 14 days (@whytryshay) February 25, 2017 Some of Lovato’s loyal fans pointed out the singer simply posted the results of her DNA test… Twitter …and was excited to share the news since Africa is a place that holds a special place in the 24-year-old’s heart. Twitter Demi eventually responded to some of the rude comments, claiming she wasn’t sharing “old” news about her ancestry… Twitter …and she highlighted the fact that she included all of the nationalities in her genetic makeup, not just African. Demi Lovato also took a moment to let all her haters know they were mean AF for ragging on her DNA test results. Twitter Seriously, why does everyone have to be such a damn critic these days. @ddlovato Are people seriously freaking out about her being 1% African? Seriously, who gives a fuck besides people obsessed with race? pic.twitter.com/IeTIaom6UO 
— Mara Miller (@SaltyCLiberal) February 25, 2017
